ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hot Key to Re-target Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: I too have noticed a lot of missed notes -- but I figured that since I was about to level, I was just noticing it more. Honestly, resists of fear/chains and
ygData.messageBody:
I too have noticed a lot of missed notes -- but I
figured that since I was about to level, I was just
noticing it more.

Honestly, resists of fear/chains and early breaks have
made it difficult to use fear kiting as a regular
tactic for me.

I much prefer selos and bellow to soften them up, lure
them to a quiet spot, whip out the brass/lute combo
and make the kill quickly.

--- Peck White <pwhite@...> wrote:
> Don't you run into trouble using this sequence on
> the retargetting the pet
> when the charm breaks early?
>
> Speaking of which, last night I had charm and fear
> breaking immediatley
> after the "glaze" and "flees" messages a lot last
> night. Has anyone else
> noticed this? There also seems to have been a lot
> more "missed notes" than
> usual.
>
> Tomerrilin
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 1:40 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hot Key to Re-target Pet
>
>
> Not that I know of, I have my fingers set to twitch:
> 2(charm)
> 6 assist hotkey
> 1,1 (some song, usually buff song)
> 3,3 (other song)
> f1,f1
> pause
> 2,2
>
>
